changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql:
insert into OSSupportDates(id,name, version,availabilityDate, endOfLifeDate, isServer) values
((select nextId + 1 from db_sequence where seq_name = "ossupportdates" ),"VMware ESXi 5.1.0","5.1.0","2012-09-10-","2016-08-24",1), ((select nextId + 2 from db_sequence where seq_name = "ossupportdates" ),"VMware ESXi 5.5.0","5.5.0","2013-09-22-","2018-09-19",1), ((select nextId + 3 from db_sequence where seq_name = "ossupportdates" ),"VMware ESXi 6.0.0","6.0.0","2015-03-12-","2020-03-12",1), ((select nextId + 4 from db_sequence where seq_name = "ossupportdates" ),"VMware ESXi 6.5.0","6.5.0","2016-11-15-","2021-11-15",1), ((select nextId + 5 from db_sequence where seq_name = "ossupportdates" ),"VMware ESXi 6.7.0","6.7.0","2018-04-17-","2022-10-15",1), ((select nextId + 6 from db_sequence where seq_name = "ossupportdates" ),"VMware ESXi 7.0.0","7.0.0","2020-04-02-","2022-04-02",1); update db_sequence set nextId = (select max(id) + 1 from OSSupportDates ) where seq_name = "ossupportdates";
